hdslSpan15mPerformanceTable.name: hdslSpan15mPerformanceTable
hdslSpan15mPerformanceTable.description: This table provides the 15-minute performance history monitoring of the last 24 hours for all HDSL spans Errored Seconds (ES), Severely Errored Seconds (SES) and Unavailable Seconds (UAS).

hdslSpan15mPerformanceEntry.name: hdslSpan15mPerformanceEntry
hdslSpan15mPerformanceEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span 15-min performance table

hdslSpan15mSlotId.name: hdslSpan15mSlotId
hdslSpan15mSlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpan15mSpanId.name: hdslSpan15mSpanId
hdslSpan15mSpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslSpan15mHistoryId.name: hdslSpan15mHistoryId
hdslSpan15mHistoryId.description: Identify the history ID within the 96 15-minute performance history.

hdsl15mESLoopANet.name: hdsl15mESLoopANet
hdsl15mESLoopANet.description: HDSL 15-min ES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mESLoopBNet.name: hdsl15mESLoopBNet
hdsl15mESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 15-min ES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mUASLoopANet.name: hdsl15mUASLoopANet
hdsl15mUASLoopANet.description: HDSL 15-min UAS count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mUASLoopBNet.name: hdsl15mUASLoopBNet
hdsl15mUASLoopBNet.description: HDSL 15-min UAS count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mSESLoopANet.name: hdsl15mSESLoopANet
hdsl15mSESLoopANet.description: HDSL 15-min SES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mSESLoopBNet.name: hdsl15mSESLoopBNet
hdsl15mSESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 15-min SES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl15mESLoopACust.name: hdsl15mESLoopACust
hdsl15mESLoopACust.description: HDSL 15-min ES count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdsl15mESLoopBCust.name: hdsl15mESLoopBCust
hdsl15mESLoopBCust.description: HDSL 15-min ES count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdsl15mUASLoopACust.name: hdsl15mUASLoopACust
hdsl15mUASLoopACust.description: HDSL 15-min UAS count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdsl15mUASLoopBCust.name: hdsl15mUASLoopBCust
hdsl15mUASLoopBCust.description: HDSL 15-min UAS count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdsl15mSESLoopACust.name: hdsl15mSESLoopACust
hdsl15mSESLoopACust.description: HDSL 15-min SES count on Loop A's customer side of the span.

hdsl15mSESLoopBCust.name: hdsl15mSESLoopBCust
hdsl15mSESLoopBCust.description: HDSL 15-min SES count on Loop B's customer side of the span.

hdslSpan24hPerformanceTable.name: hdslSpan24hPerformanceTable
hdslSpan24hPerformanceTable.description: This table provides 24-hour performance history monitoring of the last 7 days for all HDSL spans Errored Seconds (ES), Severely Errored Seconds (SES) and Unavailable Seconds (UAS).

hdslSpan24hPerformanceEntry.name: hdslSpan24hPerformanceEntry
hdslSpan24hPerformanceEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span 24-hour performance table

hdslSpan24hSlotId.name: hdslSpan24hSlotId
hdslSpan24hSlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpan24hSpanId.name: hdslSpan24hSpanId
hdslSpan24hSpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslSpan24hHistoryId.name: hdslSpan24hHistoryId
hdslSpan24hHistoryId.description: Identify the history ID within the 7 24-hour performance history.

hdsl24hESLoopANet.name: hdsl24hESLoopANet
hdsl24hESLoopANet.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hESLoopBNet.name: hdsl24hESLoopBNet
hdsl24hESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hUASLoopANet.name: hdsl24hUASLoopANet
hdsl24hUASLoopANet.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hUASLoopBNet.name: hdsl24hUASLoopBNet
hdsl24hUASLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hSESLoopANet.name: hdsl24hSESLoopANet
hdsl24hSESLoopANet.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hSESLoopBNet.name: hdsl24hSESLoopBNet
hdsl24hSESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdsl24hESLoopACust.name: hdsl24hESLoopACust
hdsl24hESLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdsl24hESLoopBCust.name: hdsl24hESLoopBCust
hdsl24hESLoopBCust.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdsl24hUASLoopACust.name: hdsl24hUASLoopACust
hdsl24hUASLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdsl24hUASLoopBCust.name: hdsl24hUASLoopBCust
hdsl24hUASLoopBCust.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdsl24hSESLoopACust.name: hdsl24hSESLoopACust
hdsl24hSESLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdsl24hSESLoopBCust.name: hdsl24hSESLoopBCust
hdsl24hSESLoopBCust.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceTable.name: hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceTable
hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceTable.description: This table provides the current 24-hour performance history monitoring for all HDSL spans Errored Seconds (ES), Severely Errored Seconds (SES) and Unavailable Seconds (UAS).

hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceEntry.name: hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceEntry
hdslSpanCurr24hPerformanceEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span Current 24-hour PM counts table

hdslSpanCurr24hSlotId.name: hdslSpanCurr24hSlotId
hdslSpanCurr24hSlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpanCurr24hSpanId.name: hdslSpanCurr24hSpanId
hdslSpanCurr24hSpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslCurr24hESLoopANet.name: hdslCurr24hESLoopANet
hdslCurr24hESLoopANet.description: HDSL Current 24-hour ES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hESLoopBNet.name: hdslCurr24hESLoopBNet
hdslCurr24hESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hUASLoopANet.name: hdslCurr24hUASLoopANet
hdslCurr24hUASLoopANet.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hUASLoopBNet.name: hdslCurr24hUASLoopBNet
hdslCurr24hUASLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hSESLoopANet.name: hdslCurr24hSESLoopANet
hdslCurr24hSESLoopANet.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hSESLoopBNet.name: hdslCurr24hSESLoopBNet
hdslCurr24hSESLoopBNet.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslCurr24hESLoopACust.name: hdslCurr24hESLoopACust
hdslCurr24hESLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour ES count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslCurr24hESLoopBCust.name: hdslCurr24hESLoopBCust

hdslCurr24hUASLoopACust.name: hdslCurr24hUASLoopACust
hdslCurr24hUASLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslCurr24hUASLoopBCust.name: hdslCurr24hUASLoopBCust
hdslCurr24hUASLoopBCust.description: HDSL 24-hour UAS count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslCurr24hSESLoopACust.name: hdslCurr24hSESLoopACust
hdslCurr24hSESLoopACust.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslCurr24hSESLoopBCust.name: hdslCurr24hSESLoopBCust
hdslCurr24hSESLoopBCust.description: HDSL 24-hour SES count on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslSpanStatisticsTable.name: hdslSpanStatisticsTable
hdslSpanStatisticsTable.description: This table lists statistics for margin, pulse attenuation and state of the loop for all spans of the HDSL loop.

hdslSpanStatisticsEntry.name: hdslSpanStatisticsEntry
hdslSpanStatisticsEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span statistics table

hdslStatisticsSlotId.name: hdslStatisticsSlotId
hdslStatisticsSlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslStatisticsSpanId.name: hdslStatisticsSpanId
hdslStatisticsSpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslLoopPairState.name: hdslLoopPairState
hdslLoopPairState.description: Current state on the HDSL loop of span: 0 - loop pair is normal 1 - loop pair is exchanged.

hdslLoopATipRingReversal.name: hdslLoopATipRingReversal
hdslLoopATipRingReversal.description: Current TIP/RING state on the HDSL loop A of span: 0 - TIP/RING on loop A is not reversed. 1 - TIP/RING on loop A is reversed.

hdslLoopBTipRingReversal.name: hdslLoopBTipRingReversal
hdslLoopBTipRingReversal.description: Current TIP/RING state on the HDSL loop B of span: 0 - TIP/RING on loop B is not reversed. 1 - TIP/RING on loop B is reversed.

hdslLoopAUpState.name: hdslLoopAUpState
hdslLoopAUpState.description: Current loop state on loop A of the span: 0 - loop is up. 1 - loop is acquiring/converging. 2 - loop is signaling.

hdslLoopBUpState.name: hdslLoopBUpState
hdslLoopBUpState.description: Current loop state on loop B of the span: 0 - loop is up. 1 - loop is acquiring/converging. 2 - loop is signaling.

hdslMarginLoopANet.name: hdslMarginLoopANet
hdslMarginLoopANet.description: Current Margin on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginHighLoopANet.name: hdslMarginHighLoopANet
hdslMarginHighLoopANet.description: Highest Margin on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginLowLoopANet.name: hdslMarginLowLoopANet
hdslMarginLowLoopANet.description: Lowest Margin on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginLoopBNet.name: hdslMarginLoopBNet
hdslMarginLoopBNet.description: Current Margin on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginHighLoopBNet.name: hdslMarginHighLoopBNet
hdslMarginHighLoopBNet.description: Highest Margin on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginLowLoopBNet.name: hdslMarginLowLoopBNet
hdslMarginLowLoopBNet.description: Lowest Margin on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslPulseAttenuationLoopANet.name: hdslPulseAttenuationLoopANet
hdslPulseAttenuationLoopANet.description: Pulse Attenuation on Loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBNet.name: hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBNet
hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBNet.description: Pulse Attenuation on Loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginLoopACust.name: hdslMarginLoopACust
hdslMarginLoopACust.description: Current Margin on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginHighLoopACust.name: hdslMarginHighLoopACust
hdslMarginHighLoopACust.description: Highest Margin on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginLowLoopACust.name: hdslMarginLowLoopACust
hdslMarginLowLoopACust.description: Lowest Margin on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginLoopBCust.name: hdslMarginLoopBCust
hdslMarginLoopBCust.description: Current Margin on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginHighLoopBCust.name: hdslMarginHighLoopBCust
hdslMarginHighLoopBCust.description: Highest Margin on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginLowLoopBCust.name: hdslMarginLowLoopBCust
hdslMarginLowLoopBCust.description: Lowest Margin on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslPulseAttenuationLoopACust.name: hdslPulseAttenuationLoopACust
hdslPulseAttenuationLoopACust.description: Pulse Attenuation on Loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBCust.name: hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBCust
hdslPulseAttenuationLoopBCust.description: Pulse Attenuation on Loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslSpanAlarmTable.name: hdslSpanAlarmTable
hdslSpanAlarmTable.description: This table provides the HDSL alarms indication on both loops of the HDSL spans.

hdslSpanAlarmEntry.name: hdslSpanAlarmEntry
hdslSpanAlarmEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span alarm table

hdslSpanAlarmSlotId.name: hdslSpanAlarmSlotId
hdslSpanAlarmSlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpanAlarmSpanId.name: hdslSpanAlarmSpanId
hdslSpanAlarmSpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslMarginAlarmLoopANet.name: hdslMarginAlarmLoopANet
hdslMarginAlarmLoopANet.description: Margin Threshold Exceeded on loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginAlarmLoopBNet.name: hdslMarginAlarmLoopBNet
hdslMarginAlarmLoopBNet.description: Margin Threshold Exceeded on loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslESAlarmLoopANet.name: hdslESAlarmLoopANet
hdslESAlarmLoopANet.description: Errored Seconds threshold exceeded on loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslESAlarmLoopBNet.name: hdslESAlarmLoopBNet
hdslESAlarmLoopBNet.description: Errored Seconds threshold exceeded on loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslUASAlarmLoopANet.name: hdslUASAlarmLoopANet
hdslUASAlarmLoopANet.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold exceeded on loop A's Network side of the span.

hdslUASAlarmLoopBNet.name: hdslUASAlarmLoopBNet
hdslUASAlarmLoopBNet.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold exceeded on loop B's Network side of the span.

hdslMarginAlarmLoopACust.name: hdslMarginAlarmLoopACust
hdslMarginAlarmLoopACust.description: Margin Threshold Exceeded on loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslMarginAlarmLoopBCust.name: hdslMarginAlarmLoopBCust
hdslMarginAlarmLoopBCust.description: Margin Threshold Exceeded on loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslESAlarmLoopACust.name: hdslESAlarmLoopACust
hdslESAlarmLoopACust.description: Errored Seconds Exceeded on loop A's Customer side of the span.

hdslESAlarmLoopBCust.name: hdslESAlarmLoopBCust
hdslESAlarmLoopBCust.description: Errored Seconds Exceeded on loop B's Customer side of the span.

hdslUASAlarmLoopACust.name: hdslUASAlarmLoopACust
hdslUASAlarmLoopACust.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold exceeded on loop A's customer side of the span.

hdslUASAlarmLoopBCust.name: hdslUASAlarmLoopBCust
hdslUASAlarmLoopBCust.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold exceeded on loop B's customer side of the span.

hdslLOSWAlarmLoopA.name: hdslLOSWAlarmLoopA
hdslLOSWAlarmLoopA.description: Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) occurred on loop A's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslLOSWAlarmLoopB.name: hdslLOSWAlarmLoopB
hdslLOSWAlarmLoopB.description: Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) occurred on loop B's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslPFOAlarmLoopA.name: hdslPFOAlarmLoopA
hdslPFOAlarmLoopA.description: Power Feed Open (PFO) on loop A's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslPFOAlarmLoopB.name: hdslPFOAlarmLoopB
hdslPFOAlarmLoopB.description: Power Feed Open (PFO) on loop B's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslPFSAlarmLoopA.name: hdslPFSAlarmLoopA
hdslPFSAlarmLoopA.description: Power Feed Short (PFS) on loop A's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslPFSAlarmLoopB.name: hdslPFSAlarmLoopB
hdslPFSAlarmLoopB.description: Power Feed Short (PFS) on loop B's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslBERAlarmLoopA.name: hdslBERAlarmLoopA
hdslBERAlarmLoopA.description: Bit Error Rate (BER) on loop A's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslBERAlarmLoopB.name: hdslBERAlarmLoopB
hdslBERAlarmLoopB.description: Bit Error Rate (BER) on loop B's Network side of the HDSL loop.

hdslSpanAlarmHistoryTable.name: hdslSpanAlarmHistoryTable
hdslSpanAlarmHistoryTable.description: This table provides the HDSL alarms history on both loops of the HDSL spans.

hdslSpanAlarmHistoryEntry.name: hdslSpanAlarmHistoryEntry
hdslSpanAlarmHistoryEntry.description: Entries of the HDSL span Alarm History table

hdslSpanAlarmHistorySlotId.name: hdslSpanAlarmHistorySlotId
hdslSpanAlarmHistorySlotId.description: Identifies the HDSL line occupied in the chassis. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpanAlarmHistorySpanId.name: hdslSpanAlarmHistorySpanId
hdslSpanAlarmHistorySpanId.description: Identifies the span of the HDSL line we are monitoring. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - Span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. Span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - Span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. Span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. Span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslMarginAlarmFirstLoopA.name: hdslMarginAlarmFirstLoopA
hdslMarginAlarmFirstLoopA.description: Date and time Margin threshold exceeded alarm first occurred on Loop A of a span

hdslMarginAlarmLastLoopA.name: hdslMarginAlarmLastLoopA
hdslMarginAlarmLastLoopA.description: Date and time Margin threshold exceeded alarm last occurred on Loop A of a span

hdslMarginAlarmCountLoopA.name: hdslMarginAlarmCountLoopA
hdslMarginAlarmCountLoopA.description: The number of times the Margin threshold exceeded alarm has occurred on Loop A of a span.

hdslLOSWAlarmCountLoopB.description: The number of times the Loss of Sync Word alarm has occurred on Loop B of a span.

hdslPFOAlarmFirstLoopA.name: hdslPFOAlarmFirstLoopA

hdslPFOAlarmCountLoopB.name: hdslPFOAlarmCountLoopB
hdslPFOAlarmCountLoopB.description: The number of times the Power Feed Open alarm has occurred on Loop B of a span.

hdslPFSAlarmLastLoopA.description: Date and time the Power Feed Short alarm last occurred on Loop A of a span

hdslPFSAlarmCountLoopA.description: The number of times the Power Feed Short alarm has occurred on Loop A of a span.

hdslPFSAlarmLastLoopB.description: Date and time the Power Feed Short alarm last occurred on Loop B of a span

hdslPFSAlarmCountLoopB.name: hdslPFSAlarmCountLoopB
hdslPFSAlarmCountLoopB.description: The number of times the Power Feed Short alarm has occurred on Loop B of a span.

hdslBERAlarmFirstLoopB.description: Date and time the BER threshold exceeded alarm first occurred on Loop B of a span

hdslBERAlarmLastLoopB.name: hdslBERAlarmLastLoopB
hdslBERAlarmLastLoopB.description: Date and time the BER threshold exceeded alarm last occurred on Loop B of a span

hdslSpanAlarmSeverityTable.name: hdslSpanAlarmSeverityTable
hdslSpanAlarmSeverityTable.description: The HDSL span alarm severity table provides severity settings for HDSL alarms reporting and threshold settings for Errored Second(ES), Margin(MAR), Unavailable Seconds(UAS) and Bit Error Rate(BER).

hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySlotId.name: hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySlotId
hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySlotId.description: The slot number of the HDSL loop whose alarm severity or threshold we are setting. The slots are numbered 1 through 16 from left to right.

hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySpanId.name: hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySpanId
hdslSpanAlarmSeveritySpanId.description: The span number of the HDSL loop whose alarm severity or threshold we are setting. Depending on the number of regenerator(s) (REGs) present in an HDSL loop, a span will be numbered as follows: 0 REG - only 1 span. 1 REG - span between LTU and REG is identified as 1. span between REG and NTU is identified as 2. 2 REGs - span between LTU and REG #1 is identified as 1. span between REG #1 and REG #2 is identified as 2. span between REG #2 and NTU is identified as 3.

hdslSpanLOSWAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanLOSWAlarmSetting
hdslSpanLOSWAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for Loss of Sync Word alarm.

hdslSpanPFOAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanPFOAlarmSetting
hdslSpanPFOAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for Power Feed Open alarm.

hdslSpanPFSAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanPFSAlarmSetting
hdslSpanPFSAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for Power Feed Short alarm.

hdslSpanMarginThreshold.name: hdslSpanMarginThreshold
hdslSpanMarginThreshold.description: Sets the HDSL Margin threshold value.

hdslSpanMarginAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanMarginAlarmSetting
hdslSpanMarginAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for Margin threshold exceeded alarm.

hdslSpanESThreshold.name: hdslSpanESThreshold
hdslSpanESThreshold.description: Sets the HDSL Errored Seconds threshold value.

hdslSpanESAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanESAlarmSetting
hdslSpanESAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for Errored Seconds threshold exceeded alarm.

hdslSpanUASThreshold.name: hdslSpanUASThreshold
hdslSpanUASThreshold.description: Sets the HDSL Unavailable Seconds threshold value.

hdslSpanUASAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanUASAlarmSetting
hdslSpanUASAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for UAS threshold exceeded alarm.

hdslSpanBERThreshold.name: hdslSpanBERThreshold
hdslSpanBERThreshold.description: Sets the HDSL BER threshold value.

hdslSpanBERAlarmSetting.name: hdslSpanBERAlarmSetting
hdslSpanBERAlarmSetting.description: Sets the severity for HDSL BER threshold exceeded alarm.
